Package com.cyberfront.crdt

Class CRDTManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.CRDTManager
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GenericCRDTManager, JsonManager

    public class CRDTManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The DeprecatedCRDTManager class is used to wrap a CRDT instance so as to interact with it. The intent of this class is to provide an interface to manage JSON documents with the CRDT types provided.

    • Field Summary

      • generateUpdate

        public static Operation generateUpdate​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode source,
                                       com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode target,
                                       long timestamp)
        Generate an DeprecatedUpdateOperation given an original and update value and a timestamp value.
        Parameters:
        source - The original JsonNode to update with a new value
        target - The new JsonNode which the update will produce given the original state
        timestamp - Effective time stamp for the update operations
        Returns:
        The update operation resulting from transforming from the source to target JsonNode values
